mng: to comprehend, to apprehend, to become aware

exm.mng: to come to understand, to realize, consciousness, awareness, Buddhist enlightenment (Sanskrit: cittotpāda)
perception, wits, power of understanding, comprehension
to suddenly realize, to suddenly see the light
a flash of realization, the truth in a flash, a moment of enlightenment (usually Buddhist)
to experience, to realize, to comprehend
to come to realize, to appreciate (feelings)
Dawu county in Xiaogan 孝感[Xiao4 gan3], Hubei
to come to oneself, to come to realize, to come to see the truth, to wake up to reality
Sun Wukong, the Monkey King, character with supernatural powers from the novel Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记[Xi1 You2 Ji4]
